website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a well-made urn with attractive but fuss-free looks, this urn has gained more satisfied customers than complaints.
pros: Handmade metal urn with a pewter finish
Subtle design is suitable for anyone who prefers an understated look
Has a sturdy feel and a lid that screws on tightly
cons: At least one customer complained that it didn't have enough interior space for a loved one's ashes
but many more were happy with their purchase

customer_reviews.title: Elegantly simple, reasonably priced with excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: When my mom died my dad picked this urn for her remains. We ordered two, preparing for her interment, and his, eventually. The urns are simple and attractive, just what we were looking for. The price was very reasonable. But I was particularly impressed with the customer service Trupoint Memorials provided along with our order. They thoughtfully sent a bereavement guide, and followed up our order with check-ins to be sure we were satisfied with the urns. Both of these were appreciated at a difficult time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet classy
customer_reviews.text: We needed an urn for my dad, who recently passed away, and I didn’t want to give the funeral home (as wonderful as they were) any more money than we already were. Their most inexpensive urn was $160. This was half that price, and really quite lovely. It was heavy and came with a “velvet” bag to put the urn in. The funeral director was so impressed that he asked where I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: This Urn was a good choice.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an urn that was modest in appearance and well made, this one is. The threaded cap fits well and is easy to use. The empty urn has good weight, feels like quality.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: loved the urn....very simple and elegant. We ordered through prime and got it the same day! I was so impressed with the quality of the product and how it was shopper, I ordered the 4 small matching urns today for family members....got it same day again, same quality .... this company made my life easier during this sad time. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Pammy1006

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking Urn
customer_reviews.text: Bought this urn for my husbands ashes. Also bought matching mini urns. I felt it was a much better buy than what was being sold at the crematory.
customer_reviews.author: B. P.

customer_reviews.title: Product was as fantastic as it looked, as I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I received my Dad’s urn in a very timely fashion and this product was outstanding quality and I proud it’s to be my Dad’s final resting place. I’m very impressed and happy with this purchase. My family think it’s lovely. The undertaker at the Funeral home even asked me where I had got the urn from, he agreed it was a lovely piece and a quality urn and he liked it too, you may get a bulk order from him! Nothing but the best for my Dad! Thanks guys for making this difficult purchase elegantly easy.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Barrett

customer_reviews.title: NA
customer_reviews.text: Family an friends love it. I purchased it for my mother. Looks sleek an of good quality. Price was great less than 100 an defiantly durable with weight
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Great Business to deal with
customer_reviews.text: The urn is a beautiful resting place for a loved one. And the service from this veteran owned business is great. Jessica even reached out to make sure everything was satisfactory. The personal touch was just amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Silvers

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I also ordered the 4 matching keepsake urns which were also perfect and beautifully made.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda from Iowa

customer_reviews.title: Great selection, timely delivered
customer_reviews.text: The pewter adult urn I received was perfect and tasteful. It was for my deceased brother and a style he would have appreciated. I know the rest of my family thinks the same. Delivery was great. I would highly recommend Trupoint Memorials should someone ask or needs their product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Holds entire ashes of adult
customer_reviews.text: Holds large amount of ashes. Entire bag. Looks very pretty. Heavy. Great value for money
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Nichole Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Gear
customer_reviews.text: This id great quality and heavy. My dad was 387 lbs, and all his remains fit. Excellent quality
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Rivers

customer_reviews.title: Very nice urn
customer_reviews.text: High quality urn at an affordable price. Funeral home had same urn for more than double the price of this one.
customer_reviews.author: RyeBread

customer_reviews.title: Great and so worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Perfect the only reason why I gave it a three for craftsmanship is because it was hard to get my husbands bag of ashes into the urn. Other then that it was perfect and I loved everything about it
customer_reviews.author: Kyleigh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My sister was well pleased with this urn. I am pleased I had the chance to make her happy during her brother's passing.
customer_reviews.author: Colormesoft

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and dignified.
customer_reviews.text: Very plain but rich looking. Well worth the price and very fine quality workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I loved the urn for my husband. Beautiful and perfect for him.
customer_reviews.author: Edith Dombrowski

customer_reviews.title: Quality and shipping
customer_reviews.text: I like quality of product, I didn't like shipping was delayed by UPS get day after my father funeral so was not usage at all.
customer_reviews.author: NTN L

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer service
customer_reviews.text: Company was excellent and a great value in our time of need. Quick delivery. Super Customer Service.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen W. Grabe

customer_reviews.title: Purchased urn for a friend's son's funeral
customer_reviews.text: Although no one ever wants to have to order an urn, this one is really nice. It has substantial weight so that it doesn't tip over and it looks very elegant.
customer_reviews.author: IAmKiPorter

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Everything we needed. The matching keepsakes help with the siblings.
customer_reviews.author: Mcisme

customer_reviews.title: Daddy’s Home
customer_reviews.text: It was time for me to give my father a proper resting place. As my husband fondly calls it “The Silver Bullet” was PERFECT
customer_reviews.author: Nakema

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice urn and large enough for my husband's ashes.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Carmichael

customer_reviews.title: ABORT YOUR PURCHASE NOW.
customer_reviews.text: HOLD EVERYTHING PEOPLE! I bought this for my itty bitty 160 pound father and was informer by the funeral home that HE DID NOT FIT. Cremains must remain together so we purchased another urn from the funeral home ......I should have let the professionals do their job.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Style
customer_reviews.text: Cremation Urn, we liked the design, the weight, and the finish of the urn. Very nice product was please when I opened the package. Price of Urn was very good for the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: The urn is exactly as described on line. It came very well packaged for safe delivery. Very plain and nice looking and seems to be of sturdy material. I am pleased with the urn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Appropriate for Arlington National Cemetery
customer_reviews.text: Taking mom's ashes to Arlington cemetery to be with her husbsnd, a military pilot. So needed a classy looking urn. She would have loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Baker

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Comparable to urns sold at the funeral home for a much more reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Urn!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product for the price. Beautiful and sturdy. Great service arrived on time. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Heavy weight and very classy looking.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Heavy weight and very classy looking. This exact urn was at the funeral home for sale at almost twice what I paid on Amazon. Very happy with this choice.
customer_reviews.author: MEWTx

customer_reviews.title: Nice simple well made urn.  Worked perfectly for our needs
customer_reviews.text: Was a simple, well made, not expensive urn that fitted our needs at the time perfectly. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great.
customer_reviews.text: I think it should be a little bit larger. That's all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service/value
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t be happier with my selection and my urn.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey R. Waller

customer_reviews.title: Classy and stylish.
customer_reviews.text: I had a great experience purchasing this urn. It is beautiful and brings great comfort
customer_reviews.author: Holly Heinzel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The urn was perfect. It was exactly what we wanted and for a fraction of the price of the urns at the funeral home.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and quality product
customer_reviews.text: The urn was beautiful. Many of my friends and family members commented on the lovely design and its weight.
customer_reviews.author: Ro Mack

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful urn
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this urn four months ago for my father. Last month he passed. The urn looked really beautiful and classy. We tried to get the urn engraved at a local shop. They were unable to engrave on the surface. We ended up doing a vinyl decal with his name and dates. I’m not sure if a different shop could have engraved it. I do know that this earn is 1/3 of the price compared to funeral homes. Overall, my family was really happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: stacy208

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Elegant
customer_reviews.text: I have used this urn for my parent's ashes. Matches their understated and solid personalities. Sturdy metal urns won't break or shatter. They could dent, if dropped, but will still be there for you.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Maddock

customer_reviews.title: Simple but elegant design
customer_reviews.text: The funeral urn we purchased was just as advertised, it arrived quickly, and was a suitable container for our loved one’s ashes. We liked the simple but elegant design and the competitive price.
customer_reviews.author: BobL

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: I used this urn for my husband's remains. It looks beautiful along side his photo.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: You will be more than pleased with ‘this purchase !
customer_reviews.text: "Absolutely the best! It was just beautiful , saved us hundreds of dollars. Very thoughtful sellers , included lovely thoughts for grieving people in an email. I would highly recommend this product."
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for helping a grieving loved one
customer_reviews.text: The Urn is simple but elegant. It shows that you cate without unnecessary drama.
customer_reviews.author: WBJJ

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional value
customer_reviews.text: Impressive urn for the money..elegant and nicely crafted...hefty,not some cheap stamped sheet metal..very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: havin fun

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Simplicity
customer_reviews.text: I like the Elegant Simplicity of this Sturdy Urn, which Contains My Husband's Ashes.
customer_reviews.author: Analeh

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice, high quality, fast delivery. It's was one less thing to worry about
customer_reviews.author: jim Watters

customer_reviews.title: Simply classy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and classy looking. Comes with a nice bag also. Nicely packaged so as to not get scratched or dings.
customer_reviews.author: R Shearer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I was very satisfied with my purchase. The urn is beautiful and just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Item matches Description
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sized, elegant, heavy, exactly as described. (I did purchase the single large urn.)
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Jones

customer_reviews.title: Terrific urn
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking urn for son 47 years. Good feel and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Item was exactly what was ordered.
customer_reviews.text: The Urn was delivered on time, as promised, and was exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A. Noble

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful memorial
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful urn. Very simple and classic. Good size. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: nicholl

product_meta.title: Grace and Mercy Pewter Large Urn for Human Ashes - A Beautiful and Humble Urn for Your Loved Ones Remains. This Lovely Simple Urn Will Bring You Comfort Each Time You See It - with Velvet Bag
feature_bullets: GIVE YOUR LOVED ONE THE QUALITY THEY DESERVE - When you've lost someone close you need a premium quality urn to hold their ashes and act as a fitting tribute to the love you shared. This beautiful cremation urn is handcrafted to give your loved one's remains the superior quality they deserve.

BEAUTIFUL AND DURABLE - This adult urn is 10 inches tall and 7 inches wide. Capacity of 200 cubic Inches, capable of holding the remains of a 200lb person. This adult urn is handcrafted from high grade sturdy brass.

LONG-LASTING, CREATED TO STAND THE TEST OF TIME. This funeral urn is made from the highest quality of materials that were carefully handmade to create a durable urn that will definitely stand the test of time. This will make you feel untroubled knowing that your loved one’s remains are secured and well-kept.

HAND CRAFTED WITH A STUNNING PEWTER FINISH - The superior craftsmanship and materials that have gone into making this cremation urn ensures the ashes of your loved one are completely protected and given the upmost of respect.

THIS URN WILL LEAVE YOU COMPLETELY SATISFIED OR FULL REFUND - Trupoint Memorials is a company who cares for you, your family, and your late loved one. If for any reason you are not completely satisfied, just return it for a full refund.
